GSD.product_version: versions from v3.8 to before v5.4.189
GSD.description:
pinctrl: samsung: drop pin banks references on error paths

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit e05221d20153383cca49d93f976edd1ede249b4a, it was introduced in version v3.8 by commit ab663789d69760d2735402f66501f20b60312a3d. For more details please see the references link.
